name: formatted-amount
description: Component formatting an amount correctly 0-padded with a currency

scripts.coverage: nyc report --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill mocha "src/**/*.test.js" --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov  && codecov
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore spec.js,test.js
scripts.builddemo: npm run clean && npm run build && babel examples --out-dir dist/examples && browserify dist/examples/index.js > dist/examples/bundle.js && copyfiles examples/index.html dist && copyfiles examples/stylesheets/*.css dist
scripts.bump-patch: npm config set sign-git-tag true && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push && npm run builddemo && npm run publishdemo

author: Julien TASSIN
